PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-11472022-10-20,  ,  ,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) expand the list of offences contained in regulations made under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 and the Canada Wildlife Act, which could be prosecuted by means of a contraventions ticket; and (2) make technical amendments to ensure that wording, references, and headings accurately reflect the substantive regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0222 Publication Date: 2022-11-09
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) expand the list of offences contained in regulations made under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 and the Canada Wildlife Act, which could be prosecuted by means of a contraventions ticket; and (2) make technical amendments to ensure that wording, references, and headings accurately reflect the substantive regulations.
